description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任中共中央政策研究室常务副主任、中共中央党校（国家行政学院）常务副校（院）长等职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He has served as the Executive Deputy Director of the Central Policy Research Office of the CPC, and the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance).

description.zh-cn: 中国陕西省下辖的地级市，是何毅亭的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shaanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省汉中市的中学，何毅亭的母校。
description.en: A secondary school located in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, and the alma mater of He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭在1971年至1979年间工作的工厂。
description.en: The factory where He Yiting worked from 1971 to 1979.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，何毅亭在此获得历史学学士和硕士学位。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education in Beijing, China, where He Yiting obtained his bachelor's and master's degrees in history.

en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构，何毅亭曾在此工作。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Committee of the CPC, where He Yiting once worked.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的最高智囊机构，何毅亭曾长期在此任职并担任常务副主任。
description.en: The top think tank of the CPC Central Committee, where He Yiting served for a long time and held the position of Executive Deputy Director.

nodes.id: 中央党建工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央党建工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党党建工作的领导机构，何毅亭曾是其成员兼秘书组组长。
description.en: A leading body responsible for the party-building work of the CPC, where He Yiting served as a member and head of its secretariat group.

nodes.id: 保持共产党员先进性教育活动领导小组

zh-cn: 保持共产党员先进性教育活动领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责“保持共产党员先进性教育活动”的领导机构，何毅亭曾是其成员。
description.en: The leading group in charge of the 'Campaign to Maintain the Advanced Nature of Communist Party Members', of which He Yiting was a member.

nodes.id: 中央深入学习实践科学发展观活动试点工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央深入学习实践科学发展观活动试点工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责“深入学习实践科学发展观活动”试点工作的领导机构，何毅亭曾是其成员。
description.en: The leading group for the pilot work of the 'Campaign to Thoroughly Study and Practice the Scientific Outlook on Development', of which He Yiting was a member.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席，何毅亭曾多次陪同其外出调研。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China, whom He Yiting accompanied on several inspection tours.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席，何毅亭被视为其嫡系亲信和文胆之一。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China, to whom He Yiting is considered a trusted confidant and key advisor.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养高级领导干部的学校，何毅亭曾任常务副校长。
description.en: The school for training senior leaders of the CPC, where He Yiting served as Executive Vice President.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会社会建设委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会社会建设委员会
en: Social Construction Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一，何毅亭曾任主任委员。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress, chaired by He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，2018年与中共中央党校合并。何毅亭曾任常务副院长。
description.en: An institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which merged with the Central Party School in 2018. He Yiting served as its Executive Vice President.

nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，何毅亭曾撰文称其为“21世纪的马克思主义”。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, which He Yiting described in an article as 'Marxism of the 21st century'.

description.zh-cn: 由卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯创立的理论体系。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义的创始人之一，何毅亭曾将习近平与其相提并论。
description.en: One of the founders of Marxism, with whom He Yiting compared Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，与何毅亭、江金权并称为习近平的文胆。
description.en: A high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China, known as one of Xi Jinping's key advisors along with He Yiting and Jiang Jinquan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，与何毅亭、王沪宁并称为习近平的文胆。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Communist Party of China, known as one of Xi Jinping's key advisors along with He Yiting and Wang Huning.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场政治运动，何毅亭曾发文反思并否定该运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, which He Yiting reflected upon and criticized in an article.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党官员，曾任中共中央党校常务副校长，其职位后由何毅亭接任。
description.en: An official of the Communist Party of China who served as Executive Vice President of the Central Party School, a position later succeeded by He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，接替何毅亭担任中共中央党校（国家行政学院）常务副校（院）长。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Communist Party of China who succeeded He Yiting as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance).

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，接任何毅亭曾担任的中共中央政策研究室常务副主任职务。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Communist Party of China who succeeded to the position of Executive Deputy Director of the Central Policy Research Office, previously held by He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 中国官员，曾任国家行政学院常务副院长，其职位后由何毅亭接任。
description.en: A Chinese official who served as Executive Vice President of the National Academy of Governance, a position later succeeded by He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭于1983年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: He Yiting joined the Communist Party of China in March 1983.

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭于1968年12月初中毕业于汉中中学。
description.en: He Yiting graduated from Hanzhong High School (junior high) in December 1968.

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭于1971年5月至1979年9月在汉中通用机械厂工作。
description.en: He Yiting worked at the Hanzhong General Machinery Factory from May 1971 to September 1979.

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭于1979年9月至1986年7月在北京师范大学学习，先后获得历史学学士和硕士学位。
description.en: He Yiting studied at Beijing Normal University from September 1979 to July 1986, obtaining bachelor's and master's degrees in history.

position.en: Principal Staff Member, Deputy Division Chief

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭于1986年7月至1989年9月在中共中央办公厅办公室工作。
description.en: He Yiting worked in the General Office of the CPC Central Committee from July 1986 to September 1989.

position.zh-cn: 处长，党建组副组长、组长，副主任，常务副主任
position.en: Division Chief, Deputy Head and Head of the Party Building Group, Deputy Director, Executive Deputy Director

description.zh-cn: 何毅亭自1989年9月起在中央政策研究室工作，历任多个职位，并于2009年4月至2013年9月担任常务副主任。
description.en: He Yiting worked at the Central Policy Research Office from September 1989, holding various positions, and served as Executive Deputy Director from April 2009 to September 2013.

relationships.target: 中央党建工作领导小组

position.en: Member and Head of the Secretariat Group

relationships.target: 保持共产党员先进性教育活动领导小组
中央深入学习实践科学发展观活动试点工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 在中央政策研究室任职期间，何毅亭作为智囊多次陪同胡锦涛外出调研。
description.en: During his tenure at the Central Policy Research Office, He Yiting, as a key advisor, accompanied Hu Jintao on numerous inspection tours.

description.zh-cn: 在中央政策研究室任职期间，何毅亭多次陪同习近平外出调研，并被外界视为习近平的嫡系亲信和文胆之一。
description.en: During his tenure at the Central Policy Research Office, He Yiting accompanied Xi Jinping on numerous inspection tours and is widely regarded as one of Xi's trusted confidants and key advisors.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会社会建设委员会

position.zh-cn: 分管日常工作的副院长 (常务副院长)
position.en: Vice President in charge of daily affairs (Executive Vice President)

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 于2020年6月15日发表文章，称习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想是“21世纪的马克思主义”。
description.en: Published an article on June 15, 2020, claiming that Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era is 'Marxism of the 21st century'.

description.zh-cn: 在其发表的文章中将习近平与卡尔·马克思相提并论。
description.en: In his published article, he compared Xi Jinping to Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 与王沪宁、江金权并称为习近平的文胆。
description.en: Known as one of Xi Jinping's key advisors, along with Wang Huning and Jiang Jinquan.

description.zh-cn: 与王沪宁、江金权并称为习近平的文胆。
description.en: Known as one of Xi Jinping's key advisors, along with Wang Huning and Jiang Jinquan.

description.zh-cn: 据政治评论家陈破空称，何毅亭曾在文章中罕见地反思并否定文化大革命，称其“不好”、“不对”。
description.en: According to political commentator Chen Pokong, He Yiting unusually reflected upon and criticized the Cultural Revolution in an article, calling it 'not good' and 'not right'.

description.zh-cn: 于2013年9月接替李景田担任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: Succeeded Li Jingtian as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School in September 2013.

description.zh-cn: 于2020年12月接替何毅亭担任中共中央党校（国家行政学院）常务副校（院）长。
description.en: Succeeded He Yiting as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance) in December 2020.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年接替何毅亭曾担任的中共中央政策研究室常务副主任职务。
description.en: Succeeded to the position of Executive Deputy Director of the Central Policy Research Office in 2017, a role previously held by He Yiting.

description.zh-cn: 于2018年4月接替马建堂担任国家行政学院常务副院长。
description.en: Succeeded Ma Jiantang as the Executive Vice President of the National Academy of Governance in April 2018.
